attributes.action: Award NHS Staff working through COVID-19 Pandemic a Medal.
attributes.additional_details:
We want due consideration for an Operational Medal to show support, solidarity and respect to the staff of our amazing NHS.

A medal, although small, will signify triumph, it will signify strength and resolution as we stand behind all the key workers in our NHS as they literally fight the war on COVID-19
attributes.background: The NHS have been working tirelessly since the start of COVID-19 with many making huge sacrifices to maintain our services. Without them so many more people would have been lost and many more families affected by this Pandemic

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

NHS staff should be awarded a service medal for working through covid-19.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560402
